Package org.gradle.api.artifacts

Interface DependencyScopeConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AntBuilderAware, Buildable, Configuration, FileCollection, HasAttributes, HasConfigurableAttributes<Configuration>, java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File>, Named
    @Incubating
public interface DependencyScopeConfiguration
extends Configuration
    A Configuration which collects dependencies, dependency constraints, and exclude rules.
